Systems Integration

Sharing is everything in today’s digital world. If you’re creating a website, internal program or mobile app, you may want it to send, receive and share data with numerous back-end systems as needed. But integrating these various systems in a scalable, practical, seamless manner can present some formidable challenges, especially where the integration of mobile apps is concerned. Thankfully, you can rely on Brightscout to plan, coordinate and test your systems integration (SI).

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Let’s Get Started” _builder_version=”3.19.7″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_use_color_gradient=”on” button_bg_color_gradient_start=”#5DE455″ button_bg_color_gradient_end=”#14C0AA” button_bg_color_gradient_direction=”210deg” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”64px||” custom_padding=”20px|72px|20px|72px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”26px” box_shadow_blur=”92px” box_shadow_spread=”3px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”center_left” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Complex integrations

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Making All the Parts Work Together

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.7″ max_width=”8%” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”24px||32px” animation_style=”slide” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”20px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Brightscout can set your systems integration journey on the right path by determining which of your current (and projected) systems your website or app will need to communicate with. We can identify specific needs and functions, ranging from online order fulfillment and financial data sharing to device-to-device communication. We can then design your project to accommodate the necessary back-end systems interactions or mobile data transmissions. Brightscout can integrate your website or app with marketing automation systems, custom IT systems, payment or shipping processing systems, real estate MLS databases, EDI interfaces and more.

Are you looking to integrate your mobile app with server-side systems? Our experts at Brightscout can help you overcome the challenges of mobile app integration so you can deliver a smooth, satisfying user experience. Depending on your project’s specific needs and objectives, we can implement point-to-point, multi-channel or EBT (enterprise service bus) solutions to facilitate sharing of data. Rigorous testing helps us ensure that all your systems talk to each other as they should.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” module_class=”rv_button closed” _builder_version=”3.19.7″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#54B454″ button_bg_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0)” button_border_color=”#54b454″ button_letter_spacing=”1.25px” button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”40px||” custom_padding=”16px|40px|16px|40px” animation_style=”zoom” button_text_size_last_edited=”off|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}” button_text_size__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover=”#54b454″ button_text_size__hover=”14px” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/right-bg6.svg” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_right” custom_padding=”58px|0px|20px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Why Choose Systems Integrations with Brightscout?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row module_class=”dotted-line-divide” _builder_version=”3.25″ module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”29px|0px|80px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Automated Reporting” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/01-bg.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”|600|||||||” background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”24px|24px|24px|24px|true|true” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}” background__hover_enabled=”on” background_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

Automated data transfer and real-time sharing to help eliminate unnecessary manual reporting.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Greater Accuracy” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/02-bg.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”|600|||||||” custom_padding=”24px|24px|24px|24px|true|true” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” global_colors_info=”{}” background__hover_enabled=”on” background_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Mobile Functionality” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/03-bg.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”|600|||||||” custom_padding=”24px|24px|24px|24px|true|true” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” global_colors_info=”{}” background__hover_enabled=”on” background_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Secure Connections” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/04-bg.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”|600|||||||” custom_padding=”24px|24px|24px|24px|true|true” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” global_colors_info=”{}” background__hover_enabled=”on” background_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

Security

Safe Sharing With Brightscout SI

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.7″ max_width=”12%” height=”0px” animation_style=”slide” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” max_width=”75%” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]Whenever any systems share data, security becomes a question – especially when that data includes sensitive financial, medical or business information. Our Brightscout SI experts can identify potential security concerns, making use of smart measures such as VPN and SSL protection to create safer, more tamper-resistant channels for your data transfers.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_css_before=”margin: 0px;” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Screen.png” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ custom_margin=”-106px||” custom_margin_tablet=”24px||” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” global_colors_info=”{}” align_phone=”center”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”64px|0px|119px|0px|false|false” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}” column_structure=”1_2,1_2″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_css_main_element=”margin: auto auto 0;” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/dribbble-shots.png” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ custom_margin=”-50px||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” global_colors_info=”{}” align_phone=”center”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ max_width=”12%” height=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” max_width=”75%” global_colors_info=”{}”]
